offerText: Do you want to showcase places or projects of social cohesion in the digital space and how they are interconnected? And that too in relation to your own themes? We offer online training sessions for different target groups on how to use the platform. An initial introduction to the platform, its features, and developing your own ideas for the first story takes about 90 minutes. The costs vary depending on the context and complexity, ranging from €100 to €250. Inquiries to: mapstories@vamos-muenster.de
